payload.description: QBECodeGen class with state vars, emit helpers, string escaping, register/label counters, toQBEType mapping. Write initial qbe_codegen.ts with the class shell and utility methods. Test: verify class can be instantiated and toQBEType maps correctly.
payload.title: Core infrastructure & class skeleton

payload.description: String constant collection (collectStringConstants), QBE data section generation (data $str.N = { b "...", b 0 }), string dedup via stringNameMap, UTF-8 escaping for QBE format. Test: generate QBE data for various string literals.
payload.title: String constants & data section

payload.description: NumberLiteral (int + float hex), BooleanLiteral, StringLiteral (reference to data section), Identifier (load from alloc). Test: verify correct QBE IL for each literal type.
payload.title: Literal expressions

payload.description: Arithmetic (+,-,*,/,%), comparison (==,!=,<,>,<=,>=), logical (&&,||), bitwise (&,|,^,<<,>>), unary (-,!,~). Handle int vs float dispatch. String equality via string_eq. Test: verify QBE IL for arithmetic, comparisons, logical ops.
payload.title: Binary & unary expressions

payload.description: Direct function calls, print/println dispatch, math builtins (sqrt,sin,cos etc), type conversion (str, int_from_string, f64_to_string). Test: verify call instruction generation.
payload.title: Simple call expressions

payload.description: VariableDeclaration with alloc+store, AssignmentExpression for new bindings (:=) and reassignment (=), type inference for the alloc. Index target assignment (array[i]=v, map[k]=v). Member target assignment (struct.field=v). Test: verify alloc/store/load patterns.
payload.title: Variable declarations & assignments

payload.description: Conditional (if/else), WhileLoop, ForLoop, ForInRange, ForEachLoop, ForInIndex, ForInMap, Break, Continue, Block. Include loop stack management and interrupt checks at back-edges. Test: verify branch/jump patterns for each loop type.
payload.title: Control flow statements

payload.description: Sync FunctionDeclaration with params, return type, gc_push_frame/gc_pop_frame. Async stub (just normal function that calls mog_future_new etc). ReturnStatement. Function attribute detection. Test: verify function definition QBE IL.
payload.title: Function declarations

payload.description: ArrayLiteral (array_alloc + array_set loop), ArrayFill ([val; count] with loop), MapLiteral (map_new + map_set). Test: verify data structure construction IL.
payload.title: Array & map literals

payload.description: StructDeclaration (register in structDefs), StructLiteral (gc_alloc + store fields at 8-byte offsets), MemberExpression for struct field access (add offset + load), SoAConstructor. Test: verify struct allocation and field access.
payload.title: Struct declarations & literals

payload.description: MemberExpression (string.len, array.len, struct fields, SoA transposed, package-qualified, map fallback). IndexExpression (array, map, string, nested, pointer). SliceExpression. Test: verify access patterns.
payload.title: Member & index expressions

payload.description: Lambda lifting to top-level function, env struct allocation via gc_alloc_closure, captured variable storage/loading at 8-byte offsets, closure fat pointer (fn_ptr + env_ptr), indirect calls through closure. Function wrappers for named functions used as values. Test: verify closure creation and invocation.
payload.title: Closures & lambdas

payload.description: TemplateLiteral with string parts and expression interpolation, type-based conversion (i64_to_string, f64_to_string), string_concat chaining. Test: verify f-string IL generation.
payload.title: Template literals & f-strings

payload.description: MatchExpression with LiteralPattern, WildcardPattern, VariantPattern (ok/err/some/none). Result/Optional type patterns with runtime calls. Test: verify match dispatch IL.
payload.title: Match expressions

payload.description: Ok, Err, Some, None expressions, PropagateExpression (?), IsSome/IsNone/IsOk/IsErr checks with optional binding. TryCatch. Test: verify tagged union operation IL.
payload.title: Result/Optional types

payload.description: MogValue construction on stack, mog_cap_call_out invocation with explicit output pointer, capability declaration emission, async capability detection from .mogdecl. Test: verify capability call IL.
payload.title: Capability calls (Host FFI)

payload.description: TensorConstruction, tensor method calls (.sum, .mean, .reshape etc), tensor binary ops, dtype mapping. Test: verify tensor-related call generation.
payload.title: Tensor operations

payload.description: generate() method: collect functions, detect async, emit string data, generate function IR, emit main() with gc_init/gc_push_frame. Handle async main with event loop. Handle CLI args. Test: verify complete program IL generation.
payload.title: Main entry point generation

payload.description: generateModuleQBEIR for multi-package, package prefix name mangling, import handling, pub declarations. Test: verify cross-module call generation.
payload.title: Module support

payload.description: Element-wise array operations (vectorized loops), matrix multiply/add via runtime calls, dot product. Test: verify vector operation loop generation.
payload.title: Vector/matrix operations

payload.description: Run existing Mog test suite through QBE backend. Compare outputs with LLVM backend. Fix any discrepancies. Build showcase.mog with QBE.
payload.title: Integration test suite
